title: Fringe, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread (gold strips on silk core)
Technique: plain weave
description: Fringe of red and gold threads with a heading and looped skirt threads arranged to give a scalloped edge; ornamented at intervals with red tufts.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fringe, 17th century.Medium: silk, metallic thread (gold strips on silk core)
Technique: plain weave. 1905-2-204.
